name: 陳昭伶
objective: 本課程的目的在於培養學生書寫各式專業書信書寫 (如簡歷、提案、會議紀錄等) 的能力，並提供各種共同合作的機會，訓練學生在未來工作上所需之團隊配合能力。搭配本課程充分的練習，學生將能夠準確且有效地運用所學之專業書信形式來達成職場上的溝通需求。
schedule:
Week 1: Course Introduction 
Week 2: Writing process 
Week 3: Reading &Writing 
Week 4: Reading &Writing 
Week 5: Reading &Writing  
Week 6: Reading &Writing 
Week 7: Reading &Writing
Week 8: Reading &Writing
Week 9: Midterm Examination 
Week 10: Reading &Writing
Week 11: Reading &Writing 
Week 12: Reading &Writing 
Week 13: Reading &Writing 
Week 14: Reading &Writing
Week 15: Reading &Writing 
Week 16: Reading &Writing 
Week 17: Reading &Writing 
Week 18: Final Examination
scorePolicy:
Grades/responsibilities: 
Class Participation & Attendance: 20% 
Midterm exam 15%
Final exam 15%
Assignments: 50% 

Note: Conscientious class attendance is required. This means being prepared for class and participating actively in all class discussions and activities. 缺課一次扣總分2分，遲到25分鐘即為缺課。缺課六次以上（含六次），本課程不予計分
